name: HUEb
description:
Hop into HUEb. A mind-bending dimension hopping 3D puzzle game inspired by Portal and Antichamber.

Special thanks to @jay_capricious for the logo art, and @scorpi_oreo for the level hint art!

Follow @mbarbagames and @ebernerd for future dev updates!

We hope you enjoy HUEb!

-Michael Barba and Eric Bernard
